name: Rescript
long_description: Rescript helps regulatory compliance and advocacy teams effortlessly track the constant stream of legal developments to always stay ahead and compliant. Rescript intelligently scans the web and analyzes regulatory changes and emerging issues, enabling teams to respond proactively and efficiently. Rescript helps Fortune 100 compliance officers juggling multi-state regulations, lobbyists tracking late-night amendments on the Hill, and trade association analysts scanning dozens of agencies at once. We’re profitable and backed by seed funding from YC, General Catalyst, and Floodgate.
one_liner: AI Regulatory Analyst for Enterprises

name: Zimi
long_description:
E-commerce brands rely on disconnected, outdated systems to manage everything after the buy button. From fulfillment and inventory to returns, customer support, and shipment tracking, post-purchase operations are messy, manual, and expensive to scale. Zimi replaces the tangle of disconnected tools with one intelligent system that runs everything after the buy button.

Despite billions spent on e-commerce tech, post-purchase operations remain a black hole—leading to delays, unhappy customers, and skyrocketing support costs. Legacy ERPs are slow, customer service tools are reactive, and logistics platforms don’t connect to CX systems—forcing brands to patch things together with manual work and multiple tools.

Zimi solves this with a single platform that connects 147+ tools and sales channels to centralize data, automate workflows, and power AI agents that proactively resolve issues before customers even ask. Brands use Zimi to route orders intelligently, manage inventory across multiple 3PLs, reduce returns friction, and deliver world-class customer experiences—without the operational chaos.

We built Zimi after watching high-growth brands lose time, money, and trust trying to scale with tools that were never designed to work together. Our founding team has deep experience across e-commerce, logistics, and SaaS, and we're building the post-purchase infrastructure every modern brand will need to compete.
one_liner: AI automating post-purchase operations and support for e-commerce

name: Quetzal
long_description: Quetzal is the first fully LLM-powered translation and internationalization suite, enabling companies to translate and internationalize their software and content instantly with minimal setup. We also handle all of your internationalization issues, from managing all of your stakeholders to bringing your product and marketing to market. No more waiting days or even weeks for translated content! Deliver a perfect experience to your users in any language, instantly.
one_liner: Simple, LLM-first translation and internationalization for software

name: TradeFlow
long_description: TradeFlow is AI-powered settlement for financial securities. During her time in financial services, Taryn saw firsthand how inefficient and costly it is to settle trades. Historically, it’s been difficult to improve this process because it’s heavily reliant on manual emails, disparate systems, and inconsistently structured data. However, the advent of powerful AI technology allows us to unlock greater automation than ever before. TradeFlow empowers back offices to do more with less by offloading these time-intensive tasks to AI.
one_liner: AI-powered settlement for financial securities

name: RentFlow
long_description:
RentFlow is the first ‘Buy Now Pay Later’ rent collection platform.

In the US alone, ~ 50% of small & medium businesses, and ~ 15% of residents are behind on their rent. RentFlow’s mission is to decrease the financial and administrative burden of late rent for everyone.

Thanks to our partner bank, we automatically pay property managers upfront for their rent & fees on the 1st of the month. Meanwhile, business owners and residents have the possibility to pay their rent in flexible installments that adapt to their cash flow needs.
We also report timely installments to all major credit bureaus to help renters build their credit score fast while paying on their own schedule.

RentFlow leverages Generative AI to provide a built-in rent collection agent and to unlock installment plans on an ongoing basis based on each tenant’s risk profile.

With RentFlow, say goodbye to late rent once and for all.
one_liner: The first 'Buy Now Pay Later' solution for Rents

name: Henry
long_description: Henry is an AI copilot for commercial real estate (CRE) brokers that seamlessly integrates a brokerage’s internal data set with external sources to generate custom presentations and financial modeling for deals. Our mission is to help CRE brokers close more deals faster, earning more while doing less repetitive work. We’re initially focusing on enabling brokers to generate deal decks in seconds—a task that typically consumes 20+ hours a week across multiple departments within a brokerage.
one_liner: Automating Deal Decks for Commercial Real Estate Brokers

name: Anglera
long_description:
At Anglera, we're developing a suite of AI agents to help e-commerce companies run their operations more efficiently. Our flagship agent helps our customers onboard, enrich, and manage their product data, reducing time per product from 15 mins down to 5 seconds.

We previously developed ML to automatically enrich millions of products at Uber Eats, and we're now on a mission to automate the most common manual workflows for every e-commerce business.
one_liner: AI-Powered Product Data Enrichment

name: General Analysis
long_description: General Analysis provides a comprehensive suite of AI safety tools, including red-teaming frameworks, interpretability techniques, and more. As AI systems become increasingly capable, their deployment in high-stakes environments poses significant risks—financial, ethical, and otherwise—where errors can lead to substantial consequences. To address these challenges, we offer access to novel tools and methodologies designed to systematically find model failure-modes and enhance model robustness.
one_liner: Automated AI Safety and Red Teaming Tools

name: Formula Insight
long_description: Formula Insight offers Institutional Investors previously inaccessible data. We provide a central repository of financial models so investors can track changes to forecasts, quantify projection accuracy and expedite analysis.  This further systematizes the investment process and enables better investment decisions.
one_liner: Help Institutional Investors manage, track & query their Excel models

name: Mica AI
long_description:
Mica builds AI Agents that automate B2B sales. Our agents analyze sales calls, generate tailored collateral, and follow up until the deal is closed.

The founders met at UC Berkeley, and at our last jobs, we saw that the best sales reps weren’t just great at selling—they were elite content creators. They crafted tailored collateral like decks and highlight videos for each buyer, and their champions used this info to advocate for purchasing their product within their companies. 

However, because this takes more than 30 minutes per call, even the best reps could only do tailored follow-ups for a few clients, leaving millions in lost deals.

Mica’s agents reduce that time to less than a minute. This lets top performers do A+ work on every deal and helps the rest of the team sell like a top performer.

Sales collateral creation and follow-up is a $11b market in the US but this is just our beachhead. We’ll ship a fleet of agents that automate and eventually replace every other facet of the $80b enterprise sales market.
one_liner: AI Agents that Automate B2B Sales

name: Affil.ai
long_description: We build AI compliance for external marketing. For example, we work with major creators to ensure that their content meets credit card marketing guidelines.
one_liner: AI Affiliate Network For Financial Companies

name: Merlin AI
long_description:
Merlin is an AI-powered ERP for construction companies. 

We provide construction companies with a single, AI-powered platform to manage their entire business operations. Our platform unifies project management, materials management, finance, estimating, and CRM—traditionally scattered across multiple systems—into one cohesive solution. For the first time, construction firms can automate and oversee every aspect of their projects in a single, intuitive system. Today, construction companies pay for 8-17 different tools - that we eliminate the need for. 

We reduce 

- Manual work by 60%
- Cut software costs by $10,000 monthly
- Complete projects 3x faster. 

Why Now?
We're witnessing a perfect storm of factors: decades of stagnation in traditional ERP systems, a multi-billion-dollar industry built on misaligned incentives, and the transformative potential of AI. This confluence creates a rare cyclical opportunity for market upheaval. The last major shift in this space occurred in the 1990s with the advent of digital systems, and now, 30 years later, we're on the cusp of another seismic change. Customers are crying out for innovation and as AI reshapes the landscape, early customer signals indicate an eagerness for smarter, more efficient systems. It's a unique window of opportunity that opens perhaps once in a multi-decade chance to redefine an entire industry's operational backbone.

Team:
KS, a BITS Pilani grad and successful startup co-founder, and Ayantika, an IIT alumni and tech expert, bring extensive coding and product development expertise together bringing about over a decade of technical expertise. Sneha ( that’s me), with over a decade of experience in supply chain management and lean manufacturing within the construction industry, has lived the pain of using ERPs in this industry.
one_liner: AI powered ERP for Construction

name: PathPilot
long_description: We empower CX teams to deploy AI agents, evaluate 100% of conversations for quality, and accelerate automation — all without needing engineering resources. Whether companies are just starting with AI or already using automation, PathPilot improves agent performance, reduces costs, and ensures the quality and compliance required for high-stakes industries like fintech and gaming.
one_liner: AI platform helping Customer Experience teams scale efficiently

name: Delineate
long_description:
Delineate is building AI agents to design better clinical trials faster.

This is a $10B dollar market, where saving even 1 day along the process is equal to $1-5M in revenue potential.

We process existing clinical trial research into specialized datasets saving scientists months of effort.

Delineate is working with two of the largest pharmaceutical companies. With one of our customers, we are helping them get to the next phase of trials faster by creating the largest dataset on a drug class ever constructed.
one_liner: Agents for Accelerated Clinical Trial Design

name: Outerport
long_description: Outerport helps convert proprietary visual data- every diagram, drawing, webpages, documents, CAD files and more into an exact text representation that can be ingested by LLMs and re-rendered back. For example, flowcharts are notoriously common in enterprise documents and are used to describe mission critical business processes. Instead of relying on faulty VLMs to understand these properly, Outerport converts this into an text-based graph object that can be reliably parsed by LLMs and are easier to debug / run evals when there are issues.
one_liner: Make every diagram, drawing, and document queryable with LLMs

name: Galini
long_description:
Galini guardrails-as-a-service filter harmful inputs and outputs based on company policies and industry regulations. We make it easy for enterprises to create, test, deploy and refine guardrails.
With Galini, product and engineering leaders enjoy peace of mind knowing their AI apps are compliant at run-time, and save $1-10M in costs from avoiding in-house build
one_liner: Compliance guardrails-as-a-service for AI applications

name: Symphony
long_description: Symphony helps enterprises train their customer-facing employees using interactive AI voice simulations of real-world scenarios. Users can create an infinite number of simulations that allow their teams to practice the job - avoiding costly mistakes with real customers. For example, we’re live with 2 of the top 3 auto insurers in NA, helping train 1000s of newly hired claims adjusters.
one_liner: Voice AI sims for next-gen employee training

name: Upshift
long_description:
Upshift is a platform for software companies to build their entire developer ecosystem, including things like OAuth delegated access, third-party app management, and more.

Up until now, only the biggest companies have had the resources to build these types of systems because it can take years and massive upfront engineering investment to ship something. We cut the time-to-production down to weeks. And this will open up previously inaccessible possibilities for mid-sized businesses and fast-growing startups.


We know how to build it. For more than six years, Adam and Thomas have worked together as eng leaders, mastering our system integration expertise from Palantir and Candid Health. Our biggest win included converting an $823 million contract vehicle for the US Army, overhauling their entire data fabric.
one_liner: Build your developer ecosystem in minutes instead of months

name: Durate
long_description: We make software to automate call shift scheduling for hospital residents/faculty and generally help hospital administrators keep track of their departments. Hospitals have long lists of requirements and rules they must follow, leading administrators to spend hundreds of hours a month ensuring their departments adhere to guidelines.
one_liner: Automated physician scheduling

name: Getcho
long_description:
Getcho is a local delivery platform for high-value goods. 

We are building a high-reliability delivery network on top of high-volume, unreliable fleets, just like how TCP builds reliable end-to-end networking on top of an unreliable base network (IP).
one_liner: The reliability platform for last-mile delivery

name: Afternoon.co
long_description:
Afternoon.co empowers founders to make better business decisions with real time financial metrics. We pair managed AI bookkeeping and tax services, to reduce administrative burden on founders. 

Accountants struggle serving 4 million+ of ecommerce brands & startups in the US, because of complexity in sales tax, multiple sales channels and inventory management. We automate a large portion of bookkeeping by integrating with their sales and inventory systems, so founders can spend less time doing admin work.
one_liner: Bookkeeping, compliance and tax for founders

name: Raycaster
long_description:
Raycaster helps companies sell complex technical products by surfacing hidden insights about their prospects. Our customers use us to automatically uncover everything from lab equipment specifications to API performance metrics - research that traditionally took weeks of manual digging.

What's exciting is how these insights naturally spread. Teams start with BD, then realize their marketing or product teams need this deep customer understanding too. We're building the intelligence layer that helps technical teams make better decisions.
one_liner: Research agents for life sciences

name: Circlemind
long_description:
We make general AI agents that can complete tasks independently.

Our first general agent is called Zero. It can complete tasks across internal tools and 300+ apps using MCP servers, such as Apollo, Slack, Gmail, Notion, etc. It can take over many self-contained tasks, giving your team longer legs to run faster. It runs entirely in the cloud. This means that you can have swarms of agents completing hundreds of tasks while you’re focusing on what really matters.

You can connect Zero to the applications you use or your custom MCP servers, and then just give it any task and watch it work for you. Zero is engineered to think deeply, execute complex tasks, and even maintain a personalized memory of your interactions.

A few notable features:
- Built-in autonomy levels, permissions, guardrails, and human approvals
- Custom instructions to teach Zero how to do things your way
- Automations e.g. run a task every day or whenever I receive an email
- Connect to your custom MCPs
- Connect to 300+ apps with one-click integrations
- Natively integrates deep research and browser use
one_liner: Circlemind makes general AI agents

name: CTGT
long_description: CTGT is building the next evolution of AI, towards intelligence that is foundationally designed to be efficient and trustworthy. Our enterprise-grade platform prevents AI hallucinations and errors in real-time while maximizing ROI. Based on seminal research that opens the "black box" of AI, we enable Fortune 500 companies to deploy AI with confidence through automated risk prevention, comprehensive audit trails, and institutional-grade security controls. With AI adoption surging to 72%, we help organizations avoid costly mistakes and reputation damage while achieving 99.99% reliability and 10x faster deployment times. Trusted by industry leaders and backed by prominent investors, CTGT transforms AI from a liability into a competitive advantage.
one_liner: Entirely New AI Stack: Efficient and Safe Alternative to LLM Ecosystem

name: Tiny
long_description: At Tiny, we’re building a new kind of ERP system for factories where AI agents automate repetitive workflows. Made for the four million factories still primarily relying on Excel. LLMs now unlock their troves of siloed unstructured data. We see a massive opportunity to build a compound startup and, beyond that, tap into network effects to unlock just-in-time manufacturing across entire supply chains.
one_liner: A new kind of ERP system for factories

name: Dexter
long_description: Dexter builds AI agents for mechanical contractors, like HVAC and plumbing businesses. Our agents capture field updates by conversation, digitize paperwork, and automate reporting, giving back-office teams real-time visibility into the field.
one_liner: AI agents for mechanical contractors

name: Gecko Security
long_description: We built Gecko for teams that want to build secure code quickly without wasting time on security tools that don’t deliver results, or relying on one-time human pentests that quickly become outdated. Gecko uses AI to understand how your application should work, simulates relevant attacks to find critical vulnerabilities, and then verifies these vulnerabilities by exploiting them. It also helps you understand the risk of these vulnerabilities and applies a working fix to keep your code secure.
one_liner: The AI Security Engineer to Find and Fix Vulnerabilities

name: Gander
long_description: Gander is building AI-powered technology that allows private jet operators to coordinate, maintain, and monetize their fleets all in one place.
one_liner: Automation System for Global Aviation

name: Chorrie
long_description: Chorrie provides healthcare RCM automation using AI browser agents to handle the busywork of heavily-manual processes like medical coding, billing, insurance followup, and more.  Using the latest models and custom automation tools tailored specifically for the provider's needs, Chorrie brings scalable automation to healthcare practices so they can focus on what matters.
one_liner: Intelligent automation for healthcare

name: ArchiLabs
long_description:
ArchiLabs is building an AI co-pilot for architecture. Instead of spending hours on tedious tasks, architects can 10x their design speed with simple AI prompts.

Brian and William met at Carnegie Mellon as engineers and separately had their own frustrating new construction experiences. Brian ran a tech-enabled homebuilding factory and found the design iteration process to be a massive bottleneck, while William built ground up homes in Texas and had a similar frustration. However, at the time, there wasn't an easy solution to the many pain points in the design process.

As AI reasoning models improve, Brian and William realized that there was a massive opportunity to fix the long-tail of frustrations and build a new construction design experience by fine tuning existing models, becoming bigger than Autodesk, the $60B company in the space.
one_liner: AI Copilot for Architects

name: Surge
long_description: Surge is Stripe for telephony. Our team has experience building telephony software at billion dollar scale. Because of increased regulation, Twilio and other SMS APIs take weeks to onboard new customers, but we can get startups onboarded same day. Surge wins by enabling easy carrier registration, better support, and higher level APIs and no code UI components to make implementation easier for startups and developers.
one_liner: Stripe for telephony

name: Ryvn
long_description: Ryvn provides the devtools and infrastructure to easily deploy any workload, on any cloud, and on-prem. Run apps in your own cloud and offer Bring Your Own Cloud (BYOC) to your customers in minutes, with built-in observability designed for sensitive industries.
one_liner: Easy and secure customer cloud deployments

name: Relvy AI
long_description: Relvy provides AI-powered debugging notebooks that help software engineers investigate and resolve incidents faster. It finds the root cause in over 70% of alerts automatically, and when it doesn’t, engineers can easily guide or correct the investigation—saving valuable time across the team.
one_liner: AI powered debugging notebooks for incident response

name: Edexia
long_description:
Edexia is an AI Teacher Assistant for grading essays. It can be trained and controlled by the teacher and can grade assignments from any curriculum, year level, subject, or format. 

Learning like a teacher, Edexia visually breaks down its understanding of the rubric, and updates this as a teacher corrects it.

Our vision is to transform education by facilitating AI’s safe and effective integration across all institutions and applications. Not using AI to replace teachers but rather to empower them—providing them with all the time and resources they need to develop their students.
one_liner: AI Teacher Assistant for Grading Essays

name: Trace
long_description:
We started Trace because we believe AI should wow customers, not frustrate them. As a result, we prioritize reliability and seamless customer interactions. 

Trace AI agents resolve calls end-to-end, securely integrating with bank systems and external APIs. So far, our agents handle quoting, application, and transaction tracking calls for our partners — but we’re still searching for new exciting use cases.

Question to all fintechs/banks: Which customer requests keep coming back to you? We’d love to learn how you handle them now and if they are ripe for automation.
one_liner: Voice AI Customer Support for Financial Services

name: Vetnio
long_description: Veterinarians spend 40% of their time on admin work, >20% on note taking alone. We're here to change that so they can focus on what really matters - providing the best care possible for animals.
one_liner: AI Copilot that automates admin work for veterinary professionals

name: NextByte
long_description:
NextByte’s AI recruiter helps you identify top candidates faster, so your team can focus on what matters – building your product and hiring the best talent. Our platform understands the requirements for each role and tailors voice-driven technical and non-technical evaluations to surface candidates who are ready for your next onsite interview. 

NextByte can screen hundreds of candidates simultaneously and provides rubric-based, detailed evaluations in minutes. Our analytics dashboards provide a clear view of technical ability, problem-solving skills, and communication under pressure across your candidate pool, so you can confidently move the right candidates forward. With NextByte, hiring teams save time, reduce bias, and make faster, data-driven hiring decisions without sacrificing quality.
one_liner: AI recruiter tuned to identify the best vibe coders

name: Excellence Learning
long_description:
Excellence an after-school maths and science program. We replace/supplement private tutoring and long-term study programs such as Kumon (over 30B TAM). US Parents are our primary customers. 

Our web and iPad software serves both ambitious and struggling students. As we believe each student is unique, we adapt our high quality courses and exercises to their knowledge and learning style in a very granular way. To facilitate learning, they get detailed text, voice and graphical explanations, can craft study plans, revise and memorize, and received human mentorship if needed. We believe LLMs have made edtech interesting, as technology now allows us to replicate a tutoring learning experience.

In addition, we offer a program with daily courses and exercises, detailed feedback on their worksheets and more (super Kumon).

Finally we sell the AI tutoring and exercise databases to schools in a B2B and B2B2C model and already work for the most prestigious institutions in France (Ecole polytechnique, college Stanislas...).

We're a passionate team of ex-quants, mathematicians and physics champions devoted to improving science education.
one_liner: AI tutor starting with maths and science

name: Alice.tech
long_description:
Alice turns generic course materials into personalized learning and exam prep using AI. We’re Duolingo  for exams, and more than 10k college students have already used Alice. 

Kim and Patrick are both technical, with computer science degrees from Oxford and Imperial. Kim, the CEO, is a domain expert in education with more than 10+ years of university teaching experience 

MRR is $20k, growing +10% week-over-week the last 8 weeks

Alice's core market opportunity is +$10b, with the global education market being almost $10trillion. As AI starts to disrupt education, Alice will use in-built network effects and virality in its product to create a global winner. 

Go Alice. Thank you!
one_liner: AI-driven exam prep

name: awen
long_description:
Instead of navigating complex menus or learning new tools, creatives can simply describe their vision in natural language—“Draw me a Swiss mountain lake. Now make it sunset. Add a boat. Now animate it.”

Awen leverages AI reasoning to understand creative intent through voice. Our goal is to redefine how creatives engage with AI technology, balancing power and ease of use for both professionals and newcomers.
one_liner: We are rebuilding photoshop with an AI-voice interface.

name: Promptless
long_description:
Docs are integral to a great customer experience, but managing them is a challenging, multi-team effort. The most successful companies recognize that fantastic docs drive adoption and bad ones cause customers to churn. Promptless is used by fast-growing startups and Fortune 500 enterprises alike to automatically update docs based on feature releases, support tickets, internal Slack conversations, and more.

Promptless is designed to be flexible—it can integrate with any docs platform, be triggered automatically from many workflows, and can pull in context from any internal knowledge source.

With Promptless, documentation becomes a strategic advantage for growth, not a bottleneck or a liability.
one_liner: An AI teammate that automatically updates your customer-facing docs

name: Ovlo
long_description:
Ovlo is a no-code AI platform for supply chain teams, building custom agents that automate critical workflows like demand forecasting, compliance validation, invoice reconciliation, and inventory optimization to eliminate manual errors and supercharge efficiency.

As an AI layer connecting onto of your current tech stack, even email and Sheets, it creates streamlined end-to-end processes, empowering teams.
one_liner: AI agents for supply chain workflow automation

name: Contrario
long_description: Contrario is a managed hiring network helping growth-stage startups and enterprises fill hard roles fast. We fill critical roles faster with AI-powered expert recruiters who deliver high-signal candidates quickly. Unlike a typical marketplace, Contrario white-glove delivers top candidates by pairing proprietary AI models with recruiter workflows to filter noise and surface only the best-fit talent.
one_liner: AI-powered recruiting team for startups

name: Verbiflow
long_description: Research on autopilot. Discover, Qualify & Engage you're market.
one_liner: People search that works

name: SalesPatriot
long_description:
SalesPatriot is a back-office operating system for defense firms. It helps you find, review, and bid on RFQ solicitations, both directly with the Pentagon and as a subcontractor.

US Government procures billions of dollars worth of parts and products every year, yet the procedure is riddled with red tape and repetitive, manual work.

Nelson worked at a manufacturing firm during his gap year prior to attending Berkeley. As the Chief of Staff, he witnessed first-hand the tedious process of finding great contract opportunities, the lengthy solicitation preparation process, and paper-based communication between departments.

He teamed up with Ben and Maciej, whom he met during Berkeley's M.E.T. admit day. Both of them had extensive experience in AI research and applications, which they applied to creating a powerful framework for humans and AI agents to collaborate during the lifecycle of a contract.

With SalesPatriot, your firm can run on autopilot - we find suitable contracts automatically, ingest RFQs from primes, streamline the communication between the departments, and provide analytics to improve your win rate.

Wether you are a manufacturer, reseller, or distributor, SalesPatriot can reduce your manual tasks, increase throughput, and boost your revenue.
one_liner: We help defense firms win more contracts with the Pentagon

name: Paragon
long_description: Paragon is the AI growth engine for distributors and manufacturers, freeing up staff and growing revenue on autopilot.
one_liner: The AI Growth Engine for Industrials

name: Amby Health
long_description: Amby Health automates billing and quality reviews for ambulance agencies (EMS), replacing large back-office teams with AI. We analyze patient reports in seconds—not months—accurately coding claims and identifying liability and care risks while eliminating costly, error-prone manual processes.
one_liner: AI Copilot for Ambulance Agencies (EMS)

name: Oki
long_description:
Oki AI tells you everything you need to know to run your company.

By reading your team’s code, tickets, messages, and more, Oki delivers personalized - and interactive - updates daily to you and other leaders.
one_liner: Personalized Updates on Company Progress

name: Cifrato
long_description:
End-to-end accounting workflows executed by AI agents.
- Invoice capture + upload to ERP/POS
- Invoice payment + reconciliation
- Tax filings
- CFO insights on demand
one_liner: AI Accountant for Retail

name: HealthKey
long_description:
HealthKey helps doctors offices generate more revenue by identifying patients who are eligible for clinical trials, and matches at-risk patients with cutting-edge treatments. Big Pharma pays a lot of money to clinics for each patient they enroll, but finding patients who qualify is an entirely manual process today. We use AI to prescreen doctors’ existing patients against Clinical Trials’ eligibility criteria, making enrollment fast and easy.

Meet with Josh (CEO) 👉 https://cal.com/healthkey/15-min-meeting
one_liner: AI-powered Patient Identification for Clinical Trials

name: Cuckoo Labs
long_description:
Cuckoo is a real-time AI translator for global sales, marketing, and support. Companies like Snowflake and PagerDuty use Cuckoo in Zoom and in-person meetings for even the most technical discussions.

Cuckoo instantly learns the technical details of your conversation from your keywords and documents and interprets into over 20 languages—customized for your specific industry and organization.
one_liner: Real-time AI translator for global sales and marketing

name: G LNK
long_description: G LNK is an AI-powered platform simplifying how healthcare companies connect with the relevant medical professionals. Our proprietary matching and ranking models instantly identify the most qualified experts, accelerating drug development and commercialization. Designed with compliance at its core, G LNK ensures every connection meets strict regulatory and ethical standards—empowering companies to innovate faster with confidence.
one_liner: Simplifying Collaboration for Healthcare Organizations & Professionals

name: Lucidic AI
long_description: As AI agents take on more complex tasks, ensuring reliability, accuracy, and efficiency is critical. Lucidic AI provides tools for AI agent devs, specifically visualizations and simulations, and engineers to test, debug, and optimize AI agents at scale, giving you full visibility into their decision-making. Modify prompts and re-run tests/simulations, watch step-by-step video replays of your agent’s execution, compare different models and configurations side by side, and visualize decision trees to prevent failures before they happen. Make sure your agents operate smoothly, adapt to changes, and perform as expected in real-world deployments.
one_liner: Weights & Biases for AI Agents

name: Bystreet
long_description: Bystreet is where deals are found.
one_liner: Automate deal origination with AI agents.

name: Riviera
long_description:
Riviera builds AI Employees for Hotels. Our first agent is a hotel phone receptionist that lets hotels spend less time answering phone calls and more time helping customers. Our system handles front-desk inquiries, in-room dining orders, and reservations. It answers every question instantly and in any language, 24/7.

We are solving a problem that older phone systems and IVRs can't: customers hate not being able to talk to someone immediately, but most travel businesses can’t dedicate additional staff to manage phone lines. Voice AI has always seemed out of reach because the technology infrastructure in the travel industry is often fragmented, with reservation systems, loyalty programs, and in-house operations software that weren’t designed with voice AI in mind. Riviera addresses this by integrating seamlessly with existing software providers and using human-sounding voice models that are highly trained on data specific to each business type and department.

Hotels spend hundreds of billions annually on staffing and risk losing potential revenue when phone lines are overwhelmed or callers hang up. By enabling them to handle unlimited calls, day or night, Riviera unlocks additional revenue and eases labor challenges.
one_liner: AI Employees for Hotels

name: Calltree AI
long_description: Calltree makes enterprise-grade AI support reps for call centers. Our AI reps take voice calls and chats like other AI support agents but can also use internal enterprise tools like a homegrown CRM or internal dashboards, like the highly trained humans working there today.
one_liner: Enterprise-grade AI support reps for call centers

name: Sennu AI
long_description: Sennu's AI agents automate Salesforce functional testing. Just connect your user stories and we'll take care of the rest.
one_liner: Hands off Salesforce QA

name: TripleZip
long_description: TripleZip is a platform that automates accounting for commercial real estate using AI. CRE firms use TripleZip to save up to 95% on accounting compared to hiring an outside firm for complex tasks like CAM reconciliation and budgeting.
one_liner: Automating CRE accounting with AI

name: Artificial Societies
long_description:
Artificial Societies uses AI to simulate large groups of people and how they interact. Companies like Anthropic and 11x are using Artificial Societies to predict how their marketing and content will perform in a simulation of their target customers, before launching in the real world. 

This is a cracked team: James left rural China at age 14, got into Cambridge, turned down a CS PhD to do startups, and - in his spare time - lead the largest ever study of an LLM society. James is joined by Patrick, an applied behavioural scientist who has run over 200 real-world experiments for businesses including Fortune 500 companies. 

We joined forces through a shared frustration that no one really understands large scale human behaviours: traditional market research is not only slow and expensive, but fundamentally flawed - it misses how people influence each other. Humans are not isolated individuals, we are social animals.

We began by simulating a network of 1,000 investors, and used it to raise a pre-seed and get into YC. Since releasing this publicly as “Wave”, startup founders have run over 3000 simulations. 

We have since released "Reach", where anyone can simulate their own LinkedIn audience and test how their posts will perform before posting for real. Artificial Societies is doing for simulations what ChatGPT did for LLMs - making them accessible to everyone.

As AI advances, we will create representative models of entire human societies. Our vision is a world where all content, products, and policies are first simulated in an Artificial Society. We are on a mission to create Artificial Collective Intelligence - humans innovate in collectives, we want to scale collective innovation with ACI.
one_liner: We use AI to simulate entire human societies

name: Miyagi Labs
long_description:
Miyagi Labs is an AI-powered platform that transforms videos from content creators and professors into complete, interactive courses.

YouTube is one of the best educational resources in the world, but it lacks the tools to turn passive watching into active learning. By making course creation as simple as uploading a video, we’re building Shopify for online education, empowering content creators and educators to transform their knowledge into engaging, interactive learning experiences.

We automatically generate high-quality courses—in under an hour—that people actually complete. On our platform, learners engage with short-answer and multiple-choice questions, as well as quizzes, receiving instant feedback and support from an AI voice tutor if they need more help.
one_liner: Shopify for AI-generated courses

name: Woz
long_description:
Woz is an AI platform that enables anyone to build and scale real software businesses - no coding required.

Historically, the ability to write code and architect software served as a massive barrier to business building. Woz eliminates this barrier with a team of AI agents that enable anyone, regardless of technical ability, to build products, go to market and grow a business all on one platform without a technical cofounder or inhouse engineering team. 

To start, we’re helping entrepreneurs build high quality mobile apps and launch them directly to the app store. For example, one of our first customers is a personal trainer building a fitness app for his clients. Ultimately, Woz aims to be the default platform where millions of AI-enabled entrepreneurs launch and scale businesses.

Woz is built by a team of engineers and ML scientists who've worked together building complex AI systems for the last decade. We're backed by YC, Untapped Ventures, MGV and more.
one_liner: AI platform enabling anyone to build and scale software businesses

name: Spott
long_description:
Spott is the first AI-native ATS/CRM for recruiting & staffing firms. We built Spott because existing recruitment platforms require extensive manual work, are clunky to use, rely on fragmented add-ons, and are not designed for AI adoption.

Spott combines everything recruiting firms need, from a full ATS & CRM to AI agents across the entire workflow, into one AI-native solution. It enables recruiters to focus on what matters most and close more placements.
one_liner: AI-native ATS/CRM for recruiting firms

name: TensorPool
long_description: Our CLI makes ML model training effortless - just describe your job, and we handle GPU orchestration and execution at half the cost of major cloud providers.
one_liner: Vercel For GPUs

name: Ergo
long_description: Ergo is AI for sales teams, monitoring customer communication across tools like Zoom, Email, and Slack to keep CRMs such as HubSpot and Salesforce up to date. Ergo’s AI agents execute revenue-generating activities, such as automating mid-funnel follow-ups based on external market signals and past customer interactions. By eliminating manual operational tasks, Ergo helps sales teams maintain active pipelines, prevent deals from stalling, and cut sales cycles in half.
one_liner: AI Agents for Sales Operations

name: Vantel
long_description:
Vantel builds AI software for commercial insurance brokers.

Our first product doubles their productivity by automating policy analysis and contract review.
one_liner: AI Software for Commercial Insurance Brokers

name: Ambral
long_description:
Ambral is an AI account management team that finds the upsell opportunities and churn-risks hiding in your data.

We act as a telemetry engine for customer relationships, synthesizing the critical signals from your messy data to generate a dynamic AI model of every account. We pinpoint exactly who needs attention and why, then recommend or autonomously take the right action to drive an expansion, prevent churn, or create a new champion.

Team: 
Sam (CEO): 2x founder. Led AI Product at Everlywell and early PM at Wonder (now valued at $7bn). Lived the pain of losing customer intimacy at scale and is obsessed with solving it. Cornell CS alum.

Jack (CTO): Ex-SpaceX Flight Software Special Projects, where he developed telemetry routing and analysis systems for the most complex machines ever created. He’s now doing the same for the complexities of customer relationships. Cornell CS alum.

Why:
As B2B companies scale, the founder-level customer intimacy that drives early growth becomes impossible to maintain. Customer context that once fit in a founder's head scatters across systems, logs, and communication channels, drowning teams in noise no human can make sense of. Account managers juggling multiple customers become reactive firefighters, bleeding revenue through missed upsells and preventable churn. We've lived this pain and are building Ambral to help teams scale their most valuable asset: customer obsession.
one_liner: AI-powered Account Managers

name: GroundControl
long_description:
GroundControl builds mission-critical software for manufacturers in highly-regulated industries (aerospace, defense, medical)

Our core product automates lengthy, complex, and regulated quality documentation in aerospace manufacturing.

As an example, the Boeing 777 is made up of over 3 million parts sourced from manufacturers around the world. These manufacturers must complete quality documentation for every part on this aircraft (machined parts, printed circuit boards, wire harnesses, assemblies, and more).

GroundControl helps manufacturers complete this required documentation accurately, in minutes instead of days.
one_liner: Vertical AI for highly-regulated manufacturing

name: Auctor
long_description: Auctor is used by leading solution engineers, system integrators, and professional services teams. Our AI agents capture requirements, generate aligned artifacts, and streamline discovery to deployment—turning weeks into hours.
one_liner: Automating Enterprise Software Implementations

name: Capacitive
long_description:
Enterprise AI without your internal data is like a computer without internet. When vital information is scattered across Slack, Notion, and Salesforce, AI tools can't deliver. And connecting dozens of those tools directly to your systems introduces significant security vulnerabilities and maintenance challenges.

Capacitive offers a better way: connect us once to where your data lives, then create secure data gateways with granular cross-platform permissions, comprehensive monitoring, and robust security filtering. Supercharge tools like Cursor with product and team-level context — or use those access points via our built-in AI chat system, where your team can navigate your organization's knowledge and perform actions across platforms in one place.
one_liner: The AI Agent Platform for Knowledge Workers.

name: Clarm
long_description:
Clarm is your AI-native search and agent builder on internal docs. We are the #1 alignment meeting killer.

Our first customers are delighted to pay us 10x less than they would spend on a Chief of Staff, creating daily product release notes, customer feedback analysis, capturing sales objections, and running dedicated customer support channels. The COO's hair is on fire and we put it out.

Our platform is built on agentic search, connecting across 40+ enterprise integrations - CRMs, email, knowledge bases.

Agents often fail because their underlying context windows are mismatched, leading them to hallucinate. We built enterprise native agentic search to ensure agents have all the context they need to operate fully autonomously.

Here's what Clarm's C-suite buyers use us for:

- a blockchain company to provide an on-demand source of product truth in natural language, reducing alignment meetings by 90%
- a financial services firm to supercharge their own product by integrating it with the target's enterprise knowledge
- the top 5 X25 open source startups (by star count) to increase engagement with their Github repo and knowledge base, turning repo visitors into contributors and customers
- North America's largest fertility clinic to tailor '000s of client support questions with extremely high sensitivity, driving up engagement and turning prospects into committed customers
one_liner: Perplexity for internal docs

name: Percival
long_description:
Percival helps wholesalers and distributors automate data entry by using AI to process documents like purchase orders and price lists. 

When wholesalers and distributors sell to other businesses, they often receive purchase orders as PDFs over email. Customers frequently use different identifiers for items, different units, and close but not quite the same descriptors. Employees aren't just copy-pasting (or manually typing) PDF data into an ERP, they have to validate every item in the ERP.

With Percival, businesses can just email customer POs and other requests to a dedicated @percivaltech.com email address. Once the request is handled, Percival responds to the email with the result: whether that's an order number in the ERP or a list of prices.
one_liner: AI-powered data entry for wholesalers and distributors

name: Operative
long_description: Operative uses AI to help organizations generate & modify internal frontend applications that connect to their existing backend APIs. You can think of it like Retool, except instead of external integrations, we connect into an organization’s internal backends, and we use AI to generate the frontend code for the web applications users want to create.
one_liner: Web application code generation for internal APIs

name: Trapeze
long_description:
Trapeze empowers doctors to answer patient calls 24/7 with our voice agents clones of their best call center reps and receptionists. In the past 3 months, we’ve onboarded 140+ doctors nationwide serving 1,000,000+ patients.

We're building the AI-native Zocdoc to create the standard for how patients and providers find each other.

Follow along on the BTS of our journey: https://www.tiktok.com/t/ZTjQyxEQx/
one_liner: AI-native Zocdoc

name: Clado
long_description: Clado puts 200 million+ people profiles (and growing) at your fingertips with simple, agentic search. If you’re interested in a global people search for sales, spreadsheets, hiring, and more, try our product.
one_liner: Deep Research for People

name: Opusense AI
long_description:
Opusense AI automates field report writing for construction field inspectors. Instead of typing up notes at the end of the day, inspectors can now walk a site, speak observations aloud, snap photos, and let our AI assistant generate a detailed, organized report on-site and in real time.

Combined, the founding team has over 15 years in the construction industry. Writing up these field reports used to take up at least 20% of the week. With Opusense, we cut that time by 5x. Our team combines deep construction experience with technical expertise, Roya has a PhD in civil engineering, and Michael has worked at multiple construction tech startups.

Why hasn’t this been done before? Construction is slow to adopt new tech, and reporting is messy, photos, voice notes, and field notes all live in silos. Turning that into a clear, structured report requires real insight into how inspectors work and what clients need. Only now, with advances in AI, can we process unstructured data adequately to generate high-quality reports in real time.

The opportunity is massive. Every inspection firm and contractor is struggling with documentation. Manual reports slow them down, create inconsistencies, and delay handoffs. We believe AI can do this better, and Opusense is proving it.
one_liner: AI for Field Inspection Reports

name: Clidey
long_description:
Clidey is building Docucod (https://docucod.com)

Docucod auto-generates and maintains always-up-to-date documentation—right from your codebase. Your team can move faster, onboard quicker, and stay focused on building.

Seamless to set up and built for scale, it fits cleanly into any repo—whether you're shipping solo or leading a growing dev team. Docucod tracks your PRs and understands what changes need to be made to the documentation and then makes them.

From onboarding guides to API references and system diagrams, Docucod creates clear, accurate documentation—without slowing you down.

It’s developer-first, fully editable, and always in sync—so you never have to choose between speed and quality again.
one_liner: Documentation made for AI Agents

name: Crimson
long_description: Crimson is the first AI platform purpose-built for complex disputes. Litigation teams use Crimson to analyze case files, draft legal documents and answer case-specific questions. By automating manual workflows throughout the lifecycle of a case, Crimson helps lawyers save more than 10 hours per week on common litigation tasks.
one_liner: The AI Associate for Litigation Lawyers

name: Jazzberry
long_description: We're creating an AI agent that orchestrates debugging tools and runs your code to find bugs. It's time to close the loop on vibe coding.
one_liner: Training LLMs to be expert bug finders

name: Klavis AI
long_description: Klavis AI is open source MCP integrations for AI Applications. Our API provides hosted, secure MCP servers, eliminating auth management and client-side code. Co-founder Xiangkai Zeng co-authored the Gemini paper and pioneered the tool calling infrastructure for Gemini. https://www.klavis.ai/
one_liner: Open Source MCP Integrations for AI Applications

name: Hemut
long_description: Next-generation truck management software to automate back-office operations for trucking companies. Features include AI agents to automate inbound/outbound calls, AI document upload to reduce manual data entry, load sourcing tools, automated accounting, and more.
one_liner: AI-powered operating system for trucking companies.

name: Mesmer
long_description: Mesmer is Cursor for CTOs. We give founders and CTOs full visibility into their org without drowning in meetings or chasing updates. We are a team of repeat founders and CTOs with 15+ years of experience each, including leading product development togehter at Origin Financial, a fintech started by Mesmer's CEO, as it scaled to 8-figure ARR, 100+ employees and a $400M valuation. Mesmer reached 6-figure ARR within a week of launching and is already live with companies worth over $8B, including Webflow and Origin Financial.
one_liner: Cursor for CTOs

name: Probo
long_description:
Probo acts like your compliance team. You tell us how you work, and Probo does the rest:
1. Set the right requirements - not overkill
2. Handle docs, risks, controls, evidence
3. Run the audit
4. Keep everything up to date afterward
Founders shouldn’t lose weeks to this stuff. Even one day is too much.
one_liner: We help you get compliant while you focus on your business.

name: Rimba
long_description:
Rimba is building an AI-powered platform to help industrial and energy companies stay compliant with environmental regulations.

Legacy systems can’t keep up with today’s complex compliance needs. Rimba offers a platform that integrates data from various software systems—like ERPs, SCADA, Sharepoint—to monitor, report, and verify emissions and other environmental data. Rimba has the capability to parse through PDFs and time-series data at scale while having an AI that continuously learns and predicts outcomes.
one_liner: AI to replace manual work in environmental compliance reporting

name: Nimbic AI
one_liner: Automatically write and update internal docs with every code commit.

name: Delty
long_description:
As software systems grow more complex and teams scale, key engineering work happens outside of code: product specs, docs, and architecture decisions and norms. That’s where a staff software engineer shines.

Delty is an AI staff engineer.

Like a seasoned engineer embedded in your team, Delty understands your architecture, code evolution, and constraints. It designs new software systems and grounds your coding agents with real engineering context to help you deliver reliable, scalable systems, fast.
one_liner: AI staff engineer: software architect that leads coding agents

name: Cotool
long_description:
Cotool is an agentic security platform that eliminates manual and repetitive work for security teams.

Today’s cybersecurity teams remain bogged down by alert fatigue, context switching, and documentation overhead. Security teams don't need more dashboards with "AI-powered insights" — they need their time back.

Cotool empowers teams to build security their way. Our platform provides an AI co-pilot that automatically assembles context across tools, a no-code agent builder that transforms successful investigations into reusable automations, and automated report generation, providing comprehensive documentation in seconds.

Unlike solutions that force teams to adapt to vendor workflows, Cotool puts the power of AI directly in practitioners' hands, letting them shape tools around their unique processes. Early users have already cut time spent on investigation and detection engineering by 70%.
one_liner: AI Agents for Security Operations Teams

name: mlop
long_description:
A fully open-source, performant and actionable Weights & Biases alternative that saves you money. 

Check out our story here! https://www.reddit.com/r/mlopai/comments/1kkc9jp/mlopai_an_efficient_free_and_opensource/
one_liner: Experiment tracking for training ML models

name: Cactus
long_description: We're building an AI copilot for solopreneurs to automate their admin work. Our AI answers the phone, qualifies customers, and books in revenue. We see a future where solopreneurs will fully vibe code and run their entire business on Cactus.
one_liner: AI copilot for solopreneurs

name: Cohesive
long_description: Cohesive is the agentic CRM for blue collar businesses like janitorial, pressure washing, landscaping, HVAC, and pest control businesses. Cohesive fully automates sales and marketing outreach to local businesses and property owners in the service area, helping local service businesses grow even while servicing clients in the field.
one_liner: The agentic CRM for blue-collar services

name: TraceRoot.AI
long_description: TraceRoot.AI is your agentic system for debugging production issues. It has access to logs, traces, source code, commit histories, PRs, issues, Notion, Slack, and more, helping you quickly investigate and resolve issues in complex systems. It visualizes a unified, structured view of your observability data and helps teams debug production issues in complex systems in no time.
one_liner: AI agents automatically fix your production bugs

name: Symbia
long_description: We help biotechs and CROs generate high-quality IND reports in minutes with AI.
one_liner: We automate clinical trial applications

name: Orange Slice
long_description:
Orange Slice uses AI agents to crawl the internet for signals/firmographic data that help sales teams find high-intent prospects by continuously monitoring the internet for buying signals and firmographic changes.

Our agents scan millions of data sources - including company websites, news articles, job postings, press releases, and social media - to detect meaningful events such as leadership changes, product launches, funding rounds, hiring trends, and more. These insights are transformed into actionable sales signals that indicate a company’s likelihood to purchase your product.

With Orange Slice, revenue teams can prioritize outreach, personalize messaging, and dramatically improve conversion rates by engaging the right accounts at the right time - based on what’s actually happening, not just static firmographics.
one_liner: AI agents that find you customers who already want to buy

name: Qualify.bot
long_description: Qualify.bot helps commercial lenders and loan brokers process business loan applications with 4x higher conversion rates. Our AI voice calls eliminates 8+ hours of manual work per loan, from lead qualification to document collection & follow-ups.
one_liner: AI phone agents for Commercial Lending

name: Janet AI
long_description:
Big companies are drowning in Jira tickets. They get hundreds if not thousands of reported issues monthly—most never read by anyone who understands the whole system. De-duping is a chore. Related issues get filed twenty times under different teams. The result: teams spend hundreds of hours just figuring out what the most important items are, before they can even start fixing them.

Janet AI is the AI-native ticket triage and management layer for Jira.

Janet AI watches every incoming ticket and immediately compares it to everything that’s come before. It builds a knowledge graph: which tickets look like the same underlying bug, which roll up into the same component failure, which issues share the same root cause. With this, it surfaces duplicate or related issues, auto-detects fixes mentioned in these related tickets, and identifies those that matter most.

Because the data’s structured, useful questions become instantly answerable using the Janet AI Chat Agent's contextual intelligence. “What are the highest priority login bugs hitting enterprise customers running version X?” “How should I fix issue PROJ-123?” “What are the most critical issues related to PROJ-456 and how should I prioritize these?”

Several multi‑billion‑dollar enterprises are already in talks with Janet AI to reduce the manual work involved in managing tickets at scale.

Interested? Check out our tryjanet.ai to watch our demo, book a call, and get started with a free Proof of Concept on your Jira tickets!
one_liner: The AI-Native Ticket Triage and Management Layer for Jira

name: Magnitude
long_description:
Knowledge workers spend 85% of their day in the browser.

Yet so much of this work is tedious, time-consuming labor.

AI has revolutionized browser automation - but it's trapped behind APIs, SDKs, and complex interfaces. Tools like UIPath and Zapier tried to help, but they're still too technical, expensive, or complicated.

What if automating your repetitive browser work was as easy as explaining it to a coworker?

That’s Magnitude. Simply record yourself taking actions on your browser, talk through the details, and our AI builds your automation. Run it instantly or schedule it - no maintenance required.
one_liner: Automate any browser workflow with a narrated screen recording

name: Pangolin
long_description: Pangolin provides a simple way to securely expose applications on private networks with identity-aware access control and high availability. It’s an open-source cloud and self-hosted solution that enables administrators to maintain data sovereignty and control user interaction to internal tools.
one_liner: Open-source secure gateway to private networks

name: Wedge
long_description: Healthcare is going bankrupt without AI. Wedge is the all-in-one AI solution for hospitals and health organizations. We allow them to effortlessly deploy and monitor AI solutions.
one_liner: The trust layer for health AI implementation.

name: AgentHub
long_description:
AgentHub helps you catch and fix errors in your AI agents - before your users ever see them.

Simulate real-world scenarios in curated RL environments for your agents - trace, evaluate, and improve agent behavior at scale. Generate large annotated datasets and experiment with different prompts, models, and configurations - all in one place - with clear visualizations of what’s working (and what’s not).

Built by a former tech lead from Apple’s Foundation Model Eval team and a product engineer from MIT with experience working on agents at startups, AgentHub makes it easy to integrate your use case and start improving your agents quickly.

Our streamlined onboarding process lets you get your agent eval environment up and running fast—no heavy lifting on your end.

Close the feedback loop and build better agents, faster - with confidence.
one_liner: The simulation and evaluation engine for AI agents

name: Doe
long_description: Doe embeds intelligent, task‑specific AI agents inside private‑equity‑owned service groups, starting with dental service organizations. The platform plugs into practice management, ERP, communication tools, and supplier catalogs to run procurement, approvals, scheduling, and analytics end‑to‑end, delivering immediate EBITDA lift and data visibility.
one_liner: Autonomous AI workforce for PE roll-ups

name: IronLedger.ai
long_description:
IronLedger provides AI agents for property accounting, starting with accounts payable. We eliminate 100s of hours of expense work for 1000s of multifamily units every month. Soon, we'll be providing end-to-end accounting services including automated billbacks, month-end close and bank reconciliation.

https://www.ironledger.ai/
one_liner: AI agents for property accounting
subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate

name: Flai
long_description:
The problem we solve: 56% of dealership leads arrive after business hours, and most dealers lose these potential customers to competitors who happen to be available 24/7. Missing after-hours calls alone costs the average dealership $1M annually in lost revenue.

We built Flai to fix this - AI assistants that answer dealership calls 24/7, scheduling test drives, oil changes, or running outbound recall campaigns so no opportunity slips away.

The result: No more missed opportunities, no more losing customers to competitors.

Our founding team has built voice AI products at HappyRobot, scaled infrastructure at Uber for millions of users, and applied data science at Netflix to solve operational challenges.

We're not just answering phones, we're helping dealerships win in an AI-first world where availability determine who gets the sale.
one_liner: We Bring Customers to Your Dealership

name: Comena
long_description: We build AI agents that automate order processing for industrial distributors and manufacturers. Say goodbye to inside sales teams spending hours on manual data entry. Comena streamlines order and quote entry, from inbox to ERP, freeing up sales teams to focus on high-value activities and proactive selling.
one_liner: AI agents for distributors and manufacturers to automate order entry.

name: Mimos
long_description:
Mimos is an Answer Engine Optimization (AEO) platform designed for regulated experts, starting with Registered Investment Advisors (RIAs). 

We help highly-regulated companies get discovered and trusted on AI platforms like ChatGPT and Gemini, driving qualified inbound while staying compliant.

===

Rohit & Mike have been working together on various technical project since middle school (13 years!) - and Mimos came about as one of those projects.
one_liner: Helping regulated firms show up in AI search.

name: Finto
long_description: Finto automates accounting for enterprises. With agents, we double an accountant's productivity in handling accounts payable - from invoice verification and supplier communication to account assignment, approval workflows, and ERP postings, all in one streamlined step.
one_liner: AI accounting for enterprises

name: Autosana
long_description:
A cloud-based tool for mobile teams to run natural language end-to-end tests. Eradicates the need to write/maintain E2E tests and manual testing. Seamlessly integrates into your CI, supports both iOS and Android, and is framework-agnostic (React Native, Flutter, Swift, etc).

No code, no setup, just catching bugs before users do.
one_liner: QA agent for mobile apps

name: Risely AI
long_description:
Risely’s AI agents will form the new operating system for universities, improving retention, staff productivity, and efficiency. Our platform integrates directly into existing university systems (SIS, LMS, CRM), learns each institution’s unique workflows, and deploys specialized AI agents. This dramatically reduces the $735 billion universities spend annually on administrative labor, expands staff capacity without increasing headcount, and improves the student experience.

This hasn't been done before because university workflows require nuanced, autonomous judgment, exactly what agentic AI was designed to solve. Our team uniquely combines deep expertise in higher education, enterprise-scale AI, and regulated enterprise sales.

Sadia previously built Salesforce’s Education Cloud from scratch, creating the core Student Information System widely used across higher education. She deeply understands university operations and maintains trusted relationships with hundreds of higher-ed CIOs and Provosts.

Danial was one of DoorDash’s earliest engineers, where he architected and scaled complex systems from zero to billions of transactions, including their search, recommendation, and Voice AI platforms. He knows how to build robust AI solutions that reliably perform at enterprise scale. 

Shahryar was a GM at Airwallex, where he built the entire Americas business from 0 to 1 and drove 11x revenue growth.  He’s also a master closer, single-handedly securing over $17M in enterprise deals at NerdWallet.  He’s a relentless startup executor with deep expertise launching and scaling go-to-market machines in highly regulated industries.

We launched six weeks ago and are already at $8k MRR, growing 55% week-over-week -- one of the fastest ramps ever in higher ed. Universities urgently need solutions that expand labor capacity and efficiency, especially as they face unprecedented budget pressure and staffing shortages.

With unmatched buyer access, deep technical expertise, and rapid early traction, we are perfectly positioned to own this enormous market.
one_liner: AI agents that automate administrative work across college campuses.

name: Floot
long_description:
Floot lets non-coders & entrepreneurs build real web apps that actually work. We’re taking a new approach by building everything from the ground up for AI. Since June, 3000+ users have created over 4000 apps on Floot.

Existing AI app builders fall short of enabling non-coders to build real, serious apps. They often:
- Break down when building anything more than a prototype or toy app
- Have non-coders stuck with errors they don’t understand
- Require non-coders to handle multiple services designed for developers (e.g. for backend, database, hosting, etc)

The fundamental problem: these AI app builders just cobble together existing developer tools and slap AI on top, but these tools were designed for humans and not for AI.

The result? Non-coders get excited, start building, hit a wall, and then abandon their projects.

Floot is purpose-built for AI. Our secret sauce:
1) Instead of reusing a coding framework designed for humans, we created a specialized framework that dictates how AI should write code and how the code runs on our infrastructure. This allows us to enforce best practices, detect errors earlier, and give the best feedback to the AI. As a result, Floot can write better code and fix issues more effectively.
2) Floot has the entire tech stack built-in (backend, database, hosting, etc) so building and managing an app feels seamless, especially for non-coders. And because we control every layer of the stack, we can optimize each layer for AI-first coding.

Because of this, non-coders can get more done with less time and prompting. They can finally build serious apps that work, instead of getting stuck in frustrating error loops and then abandoning their projects.

We also built a highly scalable hosting system directly on AWS so Floot apps can handle real traffic and business demands. This means non-coders can build, deploy, and scale their apps on a single platform seamlessly.

Plus, Floot is really fun to use! Try building an app at floot.com
one_liner: The easiest and most powerful AI app builder.

name: Avelis Health
long_description:
𝐖𝐡𝐲 𝐰𝐞 𝐛𝐮𝐢𝐥𝐭 𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐬:
I (Angel) have had three knee surgeries since my mid-teens and was billed more than $250K for care that should have cost a fraction of that. Fighting those inflated charges was so painful that we set out to build a consumer-facing AI agent to do it for others. In less than five months, we helped sixty patients erase or reduce over $280K from their medical bills.

This inspired us to fix the problem farther upstream: stopping bad payments before the patient ever sees a bill. So we launched payment integrity, machine-learning models that audit every medical claim for self-insured employers and health plans in real time.

𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐛𝐥𝐞𝐦:
• Self-insured employers waste $60 B+ each year on claims that never should have been paid

• Manual audits are slow and partial: Reviewers focus only on high-dollar claims, letting millions more slip through unnoticed.

• Existing audit software is static: Decades-old rule engines can’t keep pace with evolving codes, contracts, or billing tactics.

• Incentives are misaligned: Third-party administrators are paid to process claims, not to police them, so accuracy checks are minimal.

𝐎𝐮𝐫 𝐒𝐨𝐥𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧:
Our models audit medical claims before and after payments have been issued. We catch nuanced billing, coding, and contract errors to save 3-7% on annual claims spend. We work with self-insured employers and health plans.

𝐀𝐛𝐨𝐮𝐭 𝐔𝐬:
Angel Onuoha (CEO) and Ahmad Shehu (CTO) have worked together for 4 years. Before Avelis Health they built Zuvy, a Lagos-based fintech company that provided invoice factoring to small businesses. Zuvy was acquired by The BAS Group in 2025.
one_liner: We audit medical claims for self-insured employers and health plans.

name: PARES AI
long_description:
PARES is the single platform commercial real estate brokers need for their entire workflow, from chasing leads to closing deals and everything in between. 

With our platform, brokers can:

1) Automatically update real-time transaction data in our CRM

2) Create lists of target properties, skip-trace, and easily navigate outbound calls

3) Underwrite deals with our AI Underwriting Agent

4) Create OMs/BOVs in minutes with our AI Marketing Agent

Check us out at https://www.pares.ai/
one_liner: Helping commercial real estate brokers find and close more deals.

name: Opennote
long_description:
Opennote is building an interactive AI tutor that gives every student a truly personalized learning experience.

Most students never get to engage deeply with material in traditional classrooms or generic online tools. Opennote changes that by acting as a human-like, intuitive tutor—one that remembers your progress and adapts every session to how you learn best.
one_liner: The Interactive AI Tutor That Knows You

name: Locata
long_description:
Locata is an AI referral management platform for Primary Care practices. We deploy AI agents to automate every step of the referral process that back-office staff face daily, from submitting authorizations to broadcasting updates and following up with patients. This frees up staff to focus on patient care.

Primary Care back-offices are severely understaffed and overburdened by administrative work associated with referrals. Additionally, patients suffer navigating the complex referral process, which can have disastrous health effects if they don’t get the care they need. These factors point to a glaring gap in the system—where out of over 100 million specialist referrals issued annually in the US, only half are actually completed. Locata is tackling this problem head-on, saving administrative staff hours each week and ensuring that the referral process goes as smoothly as possible for patients and their providers.

Alejandro and Josh met at Stanford where they graduated with BS degrees in CS. Alejandro was a senior software engineer at Meta’s Reality Labs where he led development of several AI features for wearable products and prior to that conducted AI research at Stanford Medicine. Josh graduated with a masters in CS, specializing in AI, before working as a software engineer at Google, developing AI products that served over 1 billion users.

In just three weeks, we’ve secured $80K ARR and are in the process of taking our first customer live.
one_liner: AI referral management for Primary Care Practices

name: Hera
long_description:
Hera is an AI motion designer that turns 5-hour projects into 5-minute tasks. 

When you're a YouTuber making an infographic animation, instead of spending hours manually clicking buttons in Adobe After Effects, you can create the same animation in minutes in Hera. 

Through talking to our users, we realized that 95% of time spent on motion graphics is manual button clicking, not creative work. This insight led us to focus on automating the tedious parts while giving the user all creative control.

We launched in May 2025, got 100k waitlist signups in 8 weeks, and we're doubling revenue monthly.
one_liner: AI Motion Designer

name: Certus AI
long_description:
Certus AI is replacing the restaurant phone line with Voice AI.

Restaurants lose up to $100,000 per year per location from missed calls, lost orders, and abandoned hold lines. Staff are overwhelmed. IVRs frustrate customers. Call centers are expensive and impersonal.

It’s 2025. Guests don’t leave voicemails or wait on hold. They just move on.

Certus is an AI voice agent built for restaurants. It answers every call, 24/7 — taking orders, processing deliveries, booking reservations, upselling, and handling complaints in English, Spanish, French and more. Certus is built to manage the phone line end to end, from the customer call to the restaurant tech stack, with zero human intervention required. It currently integrates with industry-leading systems like Toast, Square, Clover, UberEats, DoorDash, and more.

We’re building the voice layer of the modern restaurant — the employee they’ll never fire.

We started Certus because we lived the pain. Gurveer (CEO) grew up answering phones in his family’s restaurant and helped operate them, growing from 1 to 11 locations in 7 years. Later, he and Adam (CRO) ran a restaurant growth startup to help others increase revenue, but kept watching clients bleed cash because no one picked up the phone. So we built the solution the industry always wished existed.

Until now, this problem was considered unsolvable. But Voice AI has finally crossed the conversational chasm and 72% of consumers now prefer AI over humans as long as it means faster and better service.

More importantly, the market is begging for this. The North American restaurant industry crossed $1 trillion in 2024, and it's projected to hit $1.5 trillion in 2025. Yet over $100 billion is still lost annually to missed calls, human error, and outdated tech. As the market continues to grow, so do the losses!

Our customers say it best:

- “Certus changed my life overnight.”
- “We were losing the ability to give great in-house service — the phone was killing us.”
-  “70% of my business comes through the phone. That’s mine and my 16 staffs livelihood.”
- “Before Certus, I used to lose 40 - 60 calls a day…. now my printer just stays printing!”
-  “I’ve been in the business 38 years. I’ve been waiting for this since then.”

Certus is here to fix the $120B phone problem — one call at a time.

And in doing so, we’re redefining how the restaurant industry communicates forever, starting with the phone line.
one_liner: Replacing the restaurant phone line with Voice AI

name: Vulcan Technologies
long_description:
Vulcan primarily offers two different AI services for two different constituencies:
1) Automatic regulatory drafting for executive branch agencies in government and 
2) Regulatory compliance and comment for industry
Beneath these tools is a proprietary system that we call "intelligent legal cartography," an automatic mapping of relationships between statutes, regulations, and case law. In short: Vulcan equips agencies to comply with changing state and federal law, and enables business to comment, contest, and comply with regulatory requirements.
one_liner: AI legal cartography
